title: Optimising battery energy storage solutions
blurb: I was tasked with developing a software tool to analyse and optimise operating strategies for industrial battery storage solutions particiapting in grid balancing service and arbitrage markets.  The tool is an R package which implements an optimisation algorithm using linear programming.

title: Summarising large documents using NLP
blurb: Senior managers can be inundated with documents. My task was to demonstrate how Natural Language Processing (NLP) in R can be used to summarise large documents, in particular, PDFs. This would enable managers to focus their time on reading the most relevant content.

title: Identifying manufacturing defects using deep learning
blurb: The goal was to show how images of defects can be automatically identified and classified using computer vision.  In this example, I demonstrate how this can be achieved using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) developed in Python.

title: Developing my personal website
blurb: I developed this website using the flask web application framework in Python and I host it using Amazon Web Services.  I used Bootstrap to make the website look beautiful.  Feel free to look at the code by clicking 'View Details'.
